content: I've been reflecting on my career path and how it led me to where I am today, and I realized that I also had a spiritual experience during a solo hike in the mountains around the same time as the disagreement with my boss. I felt an intense sense of peace and connection to nature, and it left me with a sense of wonder and awe. I've been exploring spiritual practices like meditation and yoga to connect with that feeling again. Can you help me find some guided meditations or yoga classes that can help me cultivate a sense of inner peace and balance in my daily life?
